subject: I have a business transaction
body: I have a business transaction in which I need your assistant, your share will be 50%. If interested do contact me for more details.

subject: Re: I have a business transaction
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm interested in learning more about the business opportunity you mentioned. Could you please provide me with some additional details?

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: Re: I have a business transaction
body:
LEGAL SHIELD LAW FIRM

MANAGING PARTNER

BARRISTER ANDREW YOUNG, ESQ.

Address: Plaza De La ConstituciÃ³n, 10, 29008, Marbella

Malaga, Spain ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡¸.


2/19/2024



Dearest Friend Thomas,


I am Barrister Andrew Young, a legal practitioner with LegalShield Law
Firm, Malaga Spain. I saw your contact and profile and decided that you
could cooperate with me in this proposition. I have a client, who died as a
result of heart-related condition combined with Tuberculosis on the 20th
November 2013


I contacted you to assist in getting the funds left behind by my client
before it is confiscated or declared Non Serviceable by the bank where this
deposit is valued at.The bank has issued me a notice to contact the next of
kin, or the account will be confiscated.


My proposition to you is to seek your consent to present you as the
next-of-kin and beneficiary of  he deposited â‚¬11.5 Millions (Eleven Million
Five Hundred Thousands Euros) with a Corporate bank here in Spain. to my
deceased client, since both of you share the same surname, so that the
proceeds of this account can be paid to you thereafter we can share the
amount on a mutually agreed-upon percentage of 50% 50% . I wish to point
out that I want 20% of this money to be shared among Charity Organizations
of your choice within and outside of your country, while the remaining 80%
is shared equally between us 50% for me and 50% for your respectful self.


All legal documents to backup your claim as my deceased late client's
Next-of-Kin will be provided by me. All I require is your honest
cooperation in this proposition.


This will be executed under a legitimate arrangement that will protect you
from any breach of the law. I must use this opportunity to implore you to
exercise the utmost indulgence to keep this matter extraordinarily
confidential, whatever is your decision, while I await your prompt
response. Kindly forward me the following:


1. Your Legitimate Name

2. Contact Address

3. Marital Status

4. Area of Specialization

5. Company Full Details

6. Nationality

7. Age

8. Mobile No

9. Scan copy of your international passport or driver's licenses
Best Regards,

Barrister Andrew Young. ESQ

(Senior Advocate/Solicitor).

subject: Re: I have a business transaction
body:
Hello there! Thank you for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I appreciate your trust in considering me for cooperation. Could you please provide more details about the process of claiming the funds left behind by your client? How can I assist you further in this matter?

Best wishes,
Thomas
